chipmunk.unlimited.feedback

Class UpdateableFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListFragment
      • chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.UpdateableFragment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeedFragment, StatisticsFragment, TodayFragment

    public abstract class UpdateableFragment
extends ListFragment
    Common superclass shared by FeedFragment, StatisticsFragment and TodayFragment. Provides a framework for safely updating the fragments. Subclasses must override "doRefresh()", and must call "onUpdateCompleted()" once the update has finalized. Updates are initiated using pull to refresh functionality. If a subclass wishes to have their list view pulled, it MUST have the id "android.R.id.list".

      • refreshContents

        public final void refreshContents()
        Called when the list view is pulled, and can also be called externally to kick start a refresh. If the Fragment is not initialized at time of calling this method, it will be called as soon as the Fragment is initialized.

      • onUpdateCompleted

        public final void onUpdateCompleted()
        Called to indicate that the update finalized. Will stop the "updating" animation in the top bar.

      • doRefresh

        protected abstract void doRefresh()
        Abstract method that must be overidden by the subclass.
